notes.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
notes.p: This study was conducted in accordance with the principles expressed in the Declaration of Helsinki. The primary protocol of this study was approved by the central ethics committee of Clinical Research Network Fukuoka Certified Review Board (CRB7180004) on May 2, 2017. Protocol amendments have been made in the study period and the participating institutions. The latest version (version 2) of the study protocol has been reviewed and approved by the Clinical Research Network Fukuoka Certified Review Board on February 5, 2020 (jRCTs071180010). Written informed consent will be obtained from all the participants.
